Package com.developersboard.web.rest.v1

Class UserRestApi

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.web.rest.v1.UserRestApi
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/users") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(T(com.developersboard.enums.RoleType).ROLE_ADMIN)") public class UserRestApi extends Object
This class handles all rest calls for users.

1.0
